title: Brookfield, Bloom Energy to launch up to $5 billion AI infra partnership - Yahoo Finance
summary: Brookfield and Bloom Energy launched an up to $5B partnership to power AI infrastructure. This propelled Bloom Energy shares up 31% premarket, underscoring market demand for clean energy solutions in high-compute sectors.

title: The one thing you should do to avoid microplastics - The Washington Post
summary:
Heat is identified as the primary driver of microplastic generation, a growing environmental and health concern.
This underscores the importance of heat management in supply chains and product design for ESG risk mitigation and operational efficiency.

title: Natural gas prices are low, but your monthly gas bill is up. Here's why - NPR
summary: Despite low wholesale natural gas prices, consumer gas utility bills are increasing. This is due to a growing proportion of the bill being allocated to infrastructure investments rather than the underlying fuel commodity cost.

title: Trump bet China would face 'tremendous difficulties' without U.S. consumers—Beijing just focused on the rest of the world instead - Fortune
summary:
China has successfully diversified its export markets, challenging U.S. assumptions of its dependence on American consumer demand.
This strategic shift has driven robust export growth despite trade war pressures, showcasing market resilience.

title: A high bar for earnings means the market reaction may be ‘varied and violent,’ says Evercore. Here’s what to do. - MarketWatch
summary:
Current equity valuations are "priced for perfection," establishing an extremely high bar for earnings performance.
Evercore warns this implies significant market volatility and downside risk if expectations are not met.
